title: Insanely low patch download speed (Beta Client)
body:
Since I wasn't on my PC last few days, I didn't patch LoL. When I started it, my internet speed was horrible, and I had like 20-25 kbps with usual 
6 mbps, and I updated some games on Steam with 6 mbps as usual. This patch eventually completed after 50 minutes. My ping in-game is also very strange these days. Can someone help me?

replies.body: Unless something is downloading in your background, your connection could be degrading and may just need some tuning up.  To start off, I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your settings are in order.  Hopefully, that's all it will need to get you back to having a smooth connection.  Let me know if you have any questions!
